project.name: Project: GraphiQL.
project.description: GraphiQL is an interactive GraphQL development environment in the browser. It allows you to form queries and explore the GraphQL schema. We used public API "Rick and Morty"

about.title: What is GraphiQL Playground?
about.description-1: An interactive web-based IDE for exploring and testing GraphQL APIs
about.description-2: Provides a user-friendly interface for querying, modifying, and testing GraphQL endpoints
about.description-3: Ideal for developers and API consumers to interact with GraphQL APIs efficiently

features.title: Features
features.description-1: Interactive Querying: Compose and execute GraphQL queries in real-time
features.description-2: Documentation Explorer: Browse and understand the API schema with integrated documentation
features.description-3: Query Variables: Define and pass variables to query for dynamic results
features.description-4: Response Preview: View and inspect the response data in a structured format
features.description-5: Queries History: View the history of requests and responses and restore or delete them
features.description-6: API Replacement : Change the endpoint with another endpoint

developer.name: oryngali
developer.description: Web Developer. Creative director in this project. Also a Jedi, Avenger, Jinchuuriki, Ascetic, Stoic, Perfectionist ...

validation.pass-pattern: Password should contain at least 1 letter, 1 number and 1 special character
